sentences.en: A Utah prairie dog emerges to forage in spring snow.
sentences.cn: 犹他州的一只草原土拨鼠顶着春雪出来觅食.

sentences.en: Cattle can damage damage forage crops by eating down to the roots.
sentences.cn: 牛羊会在吃饲草作物时会破坏作物的根部.

sentences.en: Cattle can damage forage crops by eating down to the roots.
sentences.cn: 牛通常会将作物的根吃掉,这会毁坏饲料作物.

sentences.en: Cows and sheep depends forage to feed.
Do notlet animals graze until you are notified that forage in your area is safe.
sentences.cn: 得到你所在区域的饲料安全的通知前，不要让动物吃青草。

sentences.en: Forage collapses crops like clover and our alfalfa could be planted.
sentences.cn: 像苜蓿和紫花苜蓿粮草庄稼可以被种植.

sentences.en: Forage crops also help reduce erosion of the soil.
sentences.cn: 饲料作物也有助于减少土壤浸蚀.

sentences.en: In the summer, the goats forage freely (= in any place they want to go ) .
sentences.cn: 夏天，羊群自由自在地觅食。

sentences.en: Is there really competition for forage between kiang and livestock?
sentences.cn: 藏野驴与家畜之间是否存在牧草竞争?

sentences.en: Now the nutritive value of the forage is reduced.
sentences.cn: 此时牧草的营养价值也下降了.

sentences.en: One group left the camp to forage for firewood.
sentences.cn: 一些人离开营地去寻找木柴.

sentences.en: Small grains, hay, and forage crops form the basis for raising cattle.
sentences.cn: 小谷粒 、 干草和农作物饲料构成了饲养家畜的基本饲料.

sentences.en: Such forage fish already account for nearly a fifth of the world’s total annual catch; another fifth goes to feed pigs and poultry.
sentences.cn: 这样的饲料鱼已经差不多占每年世界总捕鱼量的五分之一；另有五分之一被用于喂猪和家禽。

sentences.en: The development of the A 3 cytoplasm in forage sorghum breeding.
sentences.cn: 研究A3细胞质在饲草高粱育种上的利用.

sentences.en: The Hodotermitidae are a semi - desert species known as forage bants.
sentences.cn: 草白蚁科常称为草料蚁,是一种半沙漠种.

sentences.en: The men have been turned loose in the fields to forage like goats under the guns.
sentences.cn: 这些人被解散,在枪口下象山羊一样在田地里寻找可吃的东西.

sentences.en: They were forced to forage for clothing and fuel.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不去寻找衣服和燃料。

sentences.en: To shatter this kind of forage depends mainly on cutting and rubbing.
sentences.cn: 粉碎这类粗饲料应以剪切和搓擦为主.

trans.tran_en: food supplies for horses and cattle
to go around searching for food or other supplies

trans.tran_cn: 搜寻（食物），尤指动物觅（食），（尤指用手）搜寻（东西）
trans.tran_en: to go around searching for food or other supplies
